Key Match Events: Eric Wagaman scored with one out in the 13th inning when Jordyn Adams' grounder deflected off the glove of third baseman Miguel Vargas, leading to a 4-3 victory for the Los Angeles Angels.
Andrew Vaughn homered to left center in the 4th inning.
Taylor Ward singled to left in the 8th inning, scoring Zach Neto.
Miguel Vargas hit a sacrifice fly to center in the 10th inning, scoring Korey Lee.
Geraldo Campero singled to left in the 10th inning, scoring Jordyn Adams.
Andrew Benintendi singled to right in the 11th inning, scoring Jose Amaya.
Eric Wagaman singled to center in the 11th inning, scoring Mickey Moniak.
Jordyn Adams reached on an infield single to second in the 13th inning, scoring Eric Wagaman.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into 13 innings before the Angels secured the win.
The Chicago White Sox were dealt their 117th loss of the season.
The game was held at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, California, with an attendance of 22,757.
The game lasted 3 hours and 35 minutes.
